author: jstrachan
msg: Fixed the dependency information on commons-collections

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for using HttpServlets, such as JSP, to dispatch JMS messages to for further processing

author: jstrachan
msg: Tidied the build process so that the example web application will build fine without any customization of the build.properties which can then be deployed in the J2EE SDK. Otherwise the JMS implementation can be overridden in the build.proerties via the messenger.xml, jms.classes.dir and jms.lib.dir properties such that it can run against any JMS implementation(s)

author: jstrachan
msg: Modified build system so that to build messenger only the JMS and Servlet APIs are required and that J2EE SDK is only required for building the unit tests. The sample web application can be configured to run against any JMS implementation
